text: Lars Andersson (born 7 August 1956) is a Swedish equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Sweden Category:Equestrians at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Malmö
title: Lars Andersson (equestrian)
